# Project Mission

This repository is the source for **plaincode.github.io** - the official homepage for plaincode app development.

## Current Status
- Basic homepage structure with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
- Hosted on GitHub Pages at https://plaincode.github.io
- In early development phase

## Primary Goal
This site will serve as the new homepage for plaincode, replacing the existing WordPress version. The migration from WordPress to this static GitHub Pages site will happen incrementally with AI assistance.

## Development Approach
- Static site hosted on GitHub Pages
- Clean, modern design
- Content and features will be migrated from the WordPress site
- Maintain simplicity and performance

## Key Information
- Owner: plaincode
- Repository: plaincode.github.io
- Branch: master (GitHub Pages source)
- Domain: Will be accessible at plaincode.github.io

## Future Tasks
- Migrate content from WordPress site
- Design and implement modern homepage
- Add portfolio/project showcase
- Implement responsive design
- Add necessary pages (about, contact, etc.)
